scripts.dev: firebase use dev && firebase functions:config:unset env && firebase functions:config:set env="$(cat .env.dev.json)"
scripts.prod: firebase use dev && firebase functions:config:unset env && firebase functions:config:set env="$(cat .env.prod.json)"
scripts.serve:dev: npm run dev && firebase serve --only functions --project=dev
scripts.serve:prod: npm run prod && firebase serve --only functions --project=prod
scripts.deploy:dev: npm run dev && firebase deploy --only functions --project=dev
scripts.deploy:prod: npm run prod && firebase deploy --only functions --project=prod
